products.name: Acne Studios - Distressed Leather Biker Jacket - Black
products.brandedName: Acne Studios Distressed Leather Biker Jacket - Black
products.description: Acne Studios' jacket is made from leather that's gently faded to look authentically worn-in. Paneled with exposed seams, it has a relaxed fit enhanced by dropped shoulders and turns to reveal an embossed logo patch at the nape.

products.name: Citizens of Humanity - Zurie High-rise Straight-leg Jeans - Blue
products.brandedName: Citizens of Humanity Zurie High-rise Straight-leg Jeans - Blue
products.description: Citizens of Humanity's 'Zurie' jeans are faded and whiskered to look like an authentic vintage pair. Made from denim, they have a high-rise waist and classic straight legs.

products.name: Golden Goose - Super-star Calf Hair And Suede-trimmed Distressed Leather Sneakers - Neutrals
products.brandedName: Golden Goose Super-star Calf Hair And Suede-trimmed Distressed Leather Sneakers - Neutrals
products.unbrandedName: Super-star Calf Hair And Suede-trimmed Distressed Leather Sneakers - Neutrals
products.description: What sets Golden Goose's 'Super-Star' sneakers apart - and makes them so coveted is their lived-in look - each scuff and mark is done by hand to create "perfect imperfections". This version is made from metallic leather with suede trims and silver star appliqués. Keep the leopard-print calf-hair heel tab in focus with midi hemlines.

products.description: Self-Portrait's dress looks like two separate pieces styled together – the jacket is made from sequined bouclé, while the pleated skirt is cut from lightweight chiffon. It's belted at the waist and is embellished with crystal flower buttons along the front.

products.name: UGG Tasman (Sand/Dark Cherry) Women's Shoes
products.brandedName: UGG Tasman (Sand/Dark Cherry) Women's Shoes
products.description: The Tasman always fits tight at first especially if someone has a high instep or high volume foot. It does stretch out over time. If you are in between sizes, please size up or down based on the volume of your foot and height of your instep. Take the suede UGG Tasman slip-on from weekday lounging to a Saturday excursion! Features a Tasman trim and a raw seam down the center with an embossed UGG logo at lateral side. Luxurious sheepskin lining for breathability and warmth and a generous UGGpure wool cushioned footbed offers lasting comfort. Durable polyester binding. Treadlite by UGG outsole provides increased traction, durability, cushioning, and flexibility. Imported. Real sheep fur or lamb has been artificially dyed and treated. products.name: Affogato Tie-Detailed Linen Maxi Dress
products.brandedName: Sir. Affogato Tie-Detailed Linen Maxi Dress
products.description: With a shared love of ‘70s style codes, friends and co-founders Nikki Campbell and Sophie Coote launched SIR (or Separates, Intimates, and Ready-to-Wear) to craft the pieces they want to see in their own wardrobes. From matching sets to dream cover-ups and floaty separates, this season sees the return of favorite silhouettes in the same Bondi Beach inflection that made the label a hit.Crafted from crisp linen, the 'Affogato' dress has an asymmetric design with a draped shoulder and diagonal-cut hem that lends to its bohemian ease. Simply add some sandals and a woven tote for an effortlessly chic look.

products.name: Camel Full Length Pleated Pant
products.brandedName: Polo Ralph Lauren Camel Full Length Pleated Pant
products.description: Polo Ralph Lauren creates signature, timeless sportswear and tailored clothing that reflect a classic American style recognized and celebrated all over the world. Promote yourself to best dressed in the office with the Camel Full Length Pleated Pant. These chic high-waisted bottoms feature front pleats, a waistband with belt loops, and a folded hem for a sophisticated look with a relaxed straight fit that ensures all-day comfort. Style this closet essential with a blazer and loafers for office days, with a graphic tee and pumps for drinks with friends, or with a sleek blouse and statement earrings for date night.
